1. Parse HTML with '...'
2. Use parser configuration '....'
3. Call method '....'
4. See error

**Expected behavior**
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

**Code Example**
```java
// Minimal code example to reproduce the issue
DOMParser parser = new DOMParser();
// ...
```

**HTML Sample**
```html
<!-- The HTML that causes the issue -->
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
...
</html>
```
